body_html: Having the same issues. Also it is not able to pass options to the session.run inside the estimator, Given the new estimators in tf.estimators which are much cleaner, I was thinking of adding the functionality to provide both tf.ConfigProto to the session initialization and run_metadata and run_options via the RunConfig class expected by the estimator. Any ideas or suggestions before I write the code?

body: Having the same issues. Also it is not able to pass options to the session.run inside the estimator, Given the new estimators in tf.estimators which are much cleaner, I was thinking of adding the functionality to provide both tf.ConfigProto to the session initialization and run_metadata and run_options via the RunConfig class expected by the estimator. Any ideas or suggestions before I write the code?
